section: AR_FY2026_AOC_SPECIALTY_COURTS_STATE_CENTRAL_SERVICES_ACT776_SEC31 (Audit finding re: appropriations use; not specialty-court specific)
claim_summary: Arkansas Legislative Audit summarized a finding (AOC, year ended June 30, 2022) stating that AOC used appropriations for one purpose for another purpose (reimbursements vs dependency-neglect professional fees), and referenced a statutory transfer cap of not more than $4 million in Ark. Code Ann. § 16-10-310(d)(1) as a potential solution.
